doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Kamrul Ahasan
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Sexual Diseases & Laser Specialist
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Kamrul Ahasan is a distinguished Skin, Allergy, Sexual Diseases, and Laser Specialist in Dhaka, with extensive expertise in diagnosing and treating a wide range of skin-related issues including eczema, psoriasis, acne, fungal infections, hair loss, vitiligo, urticaria, and sexually transmitted infections. He holds an MBBS from Dhaka Medical College (DMC) and an MD in Dermatology, currently serving as Professor & Head of the Department of Dermatology at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Known for his advanced skills in laser treatments and aesthetic dermatology procedures, Prof. Dr. Kamrul Ahasan offers compassionate, up-to-date care for both acute and chronic skin diseases. He consults at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag, Dhaka, from 3pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday), providing dedicated and personalized treatment to patients seeking expert dermatological care.

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka
